title: Metro Q Clone
desc: A clone of the metro q ticketing website built with React and Tailwind CSS.

title: Schematic Spelunker
desc: Men wanted to go to space. Rockets are complex, so why not have an AI chatbot to help manage them? We built a website to help them do just that using React, TailwindCSS, Google Cloud's Gemini API and Rust.

title: R.P.S. Tournament
desc: A tournament-style Rock Paper Scissors game built with React and Tailwind CSS.

title: My Odin Projects
desc: This is a collection of projects I made while learning how to make websites via the Odin Project

title: Library
desc: Website based on the library prompt from the Odin Project inspired by Apple's VisionOS theme.

title: Minecraft Sketch
desc: This one was a lot of fun lol. It's etch-a-sketch with a minecraft theme and music. Hopefully I won't get copyrighted for it one day...

title: Spondgebob NFTs
desc: This was one of the first websites I took pride in. It was made to practice for flexboxes and I definitely gained a better understanding of flex after finishing it.
